channel.title: Dragon - Age Source Release
channel.description:
Today I've decided to Release my D-A source because some kid is taking credit for my shit and probably re-selling so Mine as well ruin his sales! The features include Clan wars free for all. Duel arena 100% Unexploitable Warriors guild. Pest control. Barrows. Osbuddy Health overlay Timers for barrage venge and super combats Dharok effect of the amulet of the damned. Dragonfire shield effect. killstreak system. Tweening. Hitbox notifications. Perfect clipping system with Pet regioning Achievement system. Bank pins and bank tabs Teleporting to bounty hunter target. Osrs wildy bosses, Venenatis, Vet'ion, Callisto, Kraken Godwars dungeon. Clipping system, includes projectiles Iron man. OSRS Data All skills working. Old school bounty hunter. All venom effects. includes hitsplat. OSBuddy Stat Overlay. Client Updater and Cache Updater. Highscore System Already in the source Will help for extra $$ OSRS Like Money Pouch System toggable removable roofs. Boss Logs Fixed venenatis webs. Membership Bond system Lava dragons with Correct drops. Corp beast every skill working correctly and efficiently mac system with mac banning Command system using Mac / Ip checking. Automated Double xp system OSRS HP overlay system MBOX system Dwarve rock cake Adding dyes to whips. Zulrah system started never finished... Needs some modifications. Fixed the regioning for the Drop tiles. Image: [img]http://i.imgur.com/Eztp5Bh.gif[/img] Image: [img]http://i.imgur.com/xtxSn52.png[/img] Image: [img]http://i.imgur.com/RwiUImb.png[/img] Image: [img]http://i.imgur.com/mxYMrGZ.png[/img] Image: [img]http://i.imgur.com/3Kxley4.png[/img] Image: [img]http://i.imgur.com/yNWrHcq.png[/img] Image: [img]http://i.imgur.com/14sYjfa.png[/img] Image: [img]http://i.imgur.com/tTxkK8D.png[/img] Image: [img]http://i.imgur.com/XH7XbpS.png[/img]
https://www.sendspace.com/file/llxsat
new new link

item.title: Dragon - Age Source Release
item.dc:creator: @fpsnipmob fpsnipmob
item.description:
@fpsnipmob wrote:

[quote=“WarTusk-RSPS, post:35, topic:554248”][quote author=fpsnipmob link=topic=673171.msg4506302#msg4506302 date=1459115070]

not one bit of the file works for me run in server side says missing and it just a mass

You’re just being clueless because it works perfectly fine.

Same lol… although have a pretty big bug with firemaking that im having trouble fixing.
[/quote]

What’s the problem?[/quote]

When i go to light the log, the log appears on the ground NEXT to player, and remains there after fire is lit… xp, animations… work, just that log… after the fire, you can pick it up and repeat… get 99 fming with 1 log rofl…

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon - Age Source Release
item.dc:creator: @rin_okumura rin okumura
item.description:
@rin_okumura wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:25, topic:554248”]Rumors go that the owner takes advantages on people hosting this.
If you want the same base (Dragon-Age is built on) Use Lost-Isle as this Dragon-Age is a bought copy with some slight edits.[/quote]
How do I take advantage? And anything I can do on this Same thing with lost-isle ITS WORST WITH THAT L0L!
See. Lmfao. You say I take advantage of people. If that was true all all the servers That host this source would be fudgeed atm. and I know of atleast 10.
I don’t have time to fudge with a rsps. Now it might be my friends fudgeing with their servers but I don’t have any reason to do so and if they are fudgeing with it oh well their fault for not changing simple usernames in code.

I fucked with one server because I asked the owner for credit but he reposted on his forums saying fuck the owner I can do whatever the fuck I want.
I’m sure u would do the same thing Someone using your work and then just say fuck you I’m not giving you shit.
In the end I sent him my 2nd vid and he did it. I never gave items out or came back on his server. Its simple courtesy to give someone whos giving u great content to praise them for doing so. Not to say fuck you.

Read full topic
